list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the fact of having committed a specified or implied offense or crime.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it is the duty of the prosecution to prove the prisoner's guilt
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đó là nhiệm vụ của việc truy tố để chứng minh tội lỗi của tù nhân

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: make (someone) feel guilty, especially in order to induce them to do something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Celeste had been guilted into going by her parents
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Celeste đã bị cha mẹ cô cảm thấy tội lỗi
